synthesis.procedure: Synthesized following a previously reported procedure.

references.label: (a)
references.citation: Jiang, Z.-Q.; Jiang, G.-Y.; Wang, F.; Zhao,Z.; Zhang, J. Chem.‒Eur. J. 2012, 18, 10525–10529.

references.label: (b)
references.citation: Lama, P.; Aggarwal, H.; Bezuidenhout, C. X.; Barbour, L. J. Angew. Chem., Int. Ed. 2016, 55, 13271–13275

synthesis.procedure: Heated at 160 °C under dynamic vacuum (3.1 × 10−2 mbar) for 6 h to yield the fully desolvated form.
Pressurized at 20 bar of methane for 24 h.
Pressurized to 6.3 bar and allowed to equilibrate for 1 day.

Pressurized to 12 bar and equilibrated for 1 day. In another attempt, pressurized to 6.3 bar, left for 1 day, then increased incrementally by 0.1 bar from 6.3 to 6.8 bar, equilibrated for 3 h at each pressure. After reaching 6.8 bar, equilibrated for 6 h, then further pressurized at 0.2 bar increments until 10 bar was reached, equilibrated at 10 bar for 12 h.
synthesis.incremental_pressure_steps: 0.1 bar from 6.3 to 6.8 bar, then 0.2 bar increments until 10 bar

synthesis.procedure: Formed at 20 bar ethane gas pressure.
